dct_title_s: [Naqshah-i tārikhī-i Īrān dar zamān-i Ḥukūmat-i ṣafavīyah dar gam-i 10 va 12 Hijrī] = Sahab historical map of Iran under the Safavi Dynasty in the 16th and 17th centuries
dct_description_sm: "Sahab series of historical maps. Map No. 1002."
